query: query($zone:String!,$r1:String,$r2:String){ viewer { zones(filter:{zoneTag:$zone}) { r1: firewallEventsAdaptive(filter:{rayName:$r1}, limit:5, orderBy:[datetime_DESC]) { datetime action source ruleId rayName clientRequestMethod clientRequestPath edgeResponseStatus } r2: firewallEventsAdaptive(filter:{rayName:$r2}, limit:5, orderBy:[datetime_DESC]) { datetime action source ruleId rayName clientRequestMethod clientRequestPath edgeResponseStatus } } } }
